ComicInfo.Summary:
The are DV8! Bliss, Copycat, Evo, Frostbite, Powerhaus, Sublime and Threshold - writer Warren Ellis created this hardcore super teen team of anti-heroes as a counterpoint to the lighthearted young super hero teams so prevalent in comics!
Ivana accompanied with DV8 goes on the island of Gamorra to ask Kaizen for the compromising information on the senator Killory. Kaizen sends her towards Minotaur, in ownership of its information.
After a fast fight, Ivana discovers that Minotaur works for Kaizen, and all this served only for estimating DV8. So he gives her the information asked in exchange for a future service.
Ivana thus contacts the senator Killory and threats him to reveal his ancient partnership with Miles Craven if she is not promoted to the head of the I.O.
ComicInfo.Title: Marriage of Convenience
